extension.description:
Yacoub's Subs - Premium subtitles
Your ultimate subtitle solution with extensive language support: ✅ 40+ languages (English, Arabic, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, etc.) ✅ Movies, TV Shows, and Anime ✅ Specialized Arabic Anime support (28+ subs per episode)
Powered by 5+ providers: OpenSubtitles, SubDL, SubSource, Podnapisi, YIFY
Features: 180+ subtitles per search, automatic language detection from Kodi settings, fast and reliable.
Created and maintained by Yacoub.
extension.news: v6.3.0: Removed AnimeTosho (provides torrents not subtitle files). 6 working providers: OpenSubtitles, Podnapisi, SubDL, SubSource, YIFY, Kitsunekko, Witanime. All core features work!
